item.description:
Join Grant Killian of Untamed Adventure Racing, one of the top adventure race organizations in the world, for an introduction to the great sport of adventure racing. Learn about these unique multisport events and how one can get started with adventure racing. Using an "immersion approach" the Untamed Adventure race director will set you on a mini adventure race through the REI store; what better way to get a glimpse of the strategy, fitness, and logistics involved?

This program is being offered for free.

While you can use this listing here on the Random Hikers site to communicate with other members who might be going you will need to register directly with REI to participate in the class using the link below.

  • http://www.rei.com/event/49420/session/67503

Space is limited so don't delay.

Store Information - contact them directly of you have any questions.

  • Boston REI Store
    401 Park Drive
    Boston, MA 02215
    (617) 236-0746
item.name: Boston REI — Adventure Racing for Beginners
